edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.asymmetricCrypto.encryption
Class OpenSSLRSAOaep

java.lang.Object
  edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.asymmetricCrypto.encryption.RSAOaepAbs
      edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.asymmetricCrypto.encryption.OpenSSLRSAOaep
All Implemented Interfaces:
AsymmetricEnc, RSAOaepEnc, Cca1, Cca2, Cpa, Eav, EncSecLevel, Indistinguishable, NonMalleable, SecurityLevel
public class OpenSSLRSAOaep
extends RSAOaepAbs

RSA-OAEP encryption scheme based on OpenSSL library's implementation. By definition, this encryption scheme is CCA-secure and NonMalleable.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

Default constructor. Uses default implementation of SecureRandom as source of randomness.

Method Detail

setKey

public void setKey(java.security.PublicKey publicKey,
                   java.security.PrivateKey privateKey)
            throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
Sets this RSAOAEP encryption scheme with a (Public,Private) key pair. In this case the user can encrypt and decrypt messages.

Parameters:
publicKey - should be RSAPublicKey.
privateKey - should be RSAPrivateKey or RSAPrivateCRTKey.
Throws:
java.security.InvalidKeyException - if the given keys are not instances of RSA keys.

setKey

public void setKey(java.security.PublicKey publicKey)
            throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
Sets this RSAOAEP encryption scheme only with public key. In this case the user can encrypt messages but can not decrypt messages.

Parameters:
publicKey - should be RSAPublicKey.
Throws:
java.security.InvalidKeyException - if the given key is not instance of RSAPublickey.

getMaxLengthOfByteArrayForPlaintext

public int getMaxLengthOfByteArrayForPlaintext()
Returns the maximum size of the byte array that can be passed to generatePlaintext function. This is the maximum size of a byte array that can be converted to a Plaintext object suitable to this encryption scheme.

Returns:
the maximum size of the byte array that can be passed to generatePlaintext function.

encrypt

public AsymmetricCiphertext encrypt(Plaintext plaintext)
Encrypts the given plaintext according to the RSAOAEP algorithm using OpenSSL implementation.

Parameters:
plaintext - the plaintext to encrypt. MUST be an instance of ByteArrayPlaintext.
Returns:
Ciphertext contains the encrypted plaintext.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no public key was set.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given Plaintext is not instance of ByteArrayPlaintext.

decrypt

public Plaintext decrypt(AsymmetricCiphertext cipher)
                  throws java.security.KeyException
Decrypts the given ciphertext according to the RSAOAEP algorithm using OpenSSL implementation.

Parameters:
cipher - the ciphertext to decrypt. Must be an instance of ByteArrayAsymCiphertext.
Returns:
Plaintext contains the decrypted ciphertext.
Throws:
java.security.KeyException - if no private key was set.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given cipher is not instance of ByteArrayAsymCiphertext.
